bio: Sodapoppin is a veteran Twitch streamer entertaining viewers with humor and games.
Zackrawrr shares deep gaming insights, community interactions, and variety gameplay.
Old man who yells at his screen a lot.
Official TimTheTatman 24/7 VOD Channel! - Bald, Cowboys fan & Fat.

Hi, my name is Thor. I've been in the games industry since 2004. I worked for Blizzard Entertainment, Amazon Games Studios, the United States Department of Energy, and now I own my own studio called Pirate Software. I'm a game developer, a hacker, and a giant nerd. Ask me stuff!
The wigglers of @PirateSoftware. We rescue ferrets from around WA and give them a great life here as a forever home.
